Model: OPPO Reno4 Pro (Starry Night, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage)
comment: Reno4 pro phone truely feels like a premium phone. The infinity display (edge display or 3d curve) makes this phone stand apart from all the other phones in this price segment.The phone also has a great feel to it when holding (it's really thin).Now coming to the usage part:Display (5/5) - the dispaly is really good I think the 90Hz refresh rate would have a hand in it.Charging (6/5)- the best aspect by far, the 65W charging is really awesome and charges the phone really fast.Sound (5/5) - the sound is really goodCamera (4/5) - camera for this segment is also really good stand alone (maybe a point less as compared to Reno3 pro).This is the intial review or this smartphone, I think it really does justice to the price point.
